name: Basalt (RedNaK)
description:
Soundscape experience #1: Matter & resonating cubesby Guillaume Tiger and Stéphanie Mader

First version made during the Digital Art Jam 2017

Use arrows on keyboard or the left stick of a controller to navigate the soundscape

Unzip and start the game with Basalt64.bat (required to start PureData and the interactive soundscape)

Best experienced with a headset
